mapper.update:
update strategy_qos
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
location = #{location,jdbcType=TINYINT},
limit_speed_mode = #{limitSpeedMode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
work_mode = #{workMode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
message_type = #{messageType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
up_value = #{upValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
up_unit = #{upUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
down_value = #{downValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
down_unit = #{downUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
security_rank = #{securityRank,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update strategy_qos set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, location = #{location,jdbcType=TINYINT}, limit_speed_mode = #{limitSpeedMode,jdbcType=TINYINT}, work_mode = #{workMode,jdbcType=TINYINT}, message_type = #{messageType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, up_value = #{upValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, up_unit = #{upUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, down_value = #{downValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, down_unit = #{downUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, security_rank = #{securityRank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(0) from strategy_qos
and name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and name like CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and work_mode = #{workMode,jdbcType=TINYINT}

select from strategy_qos
and name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and name like CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and work_mode = #{workMode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by gmt_create desc, id desc
select from strategy_qos where id in (select strategy_id from business_strategy where channel_info_id = #{channelInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and type = 6)
